lines.text: I'm doing a man thing here. Staring death in the face. Stuff like that.
Isn't it time we did that father-son bonding thing or somethin'?
I'm supposed to wanna do that sort of thing at my age. It's a teen thing.
About 3 fries short of a Happy Meal.

[to Okey]
Well, I guess I'd better go find a safe place to sleep. Safe from wild animals and high-wire perverts.
I don't believe in monsters because monsters don't exist, it did not inhabit my body, I did not become a fish!
